Day 27: JavaScript Challenge

26 September 2017 written by Muhammad D. Ramadhan

Scrolling that fancy carousel by grabbing and moving it back and forth… That sounds boring.

At first, I really wanted to skip ahead and move on to the next challenge–I was terrified by CSS. After hearing ちえさ せれな said ‘yes’ to my invitation, I got up and read that CSS snippet with hustle to fully understand how it works. Sometime affection really affects people. And then I found a great resource about CSS 3D transforms! Kudos to David DeSandro for his clear explanation!

I am not willing to bother myself repeating what the author says. Let him explain himself. Here’s the demo.

By the way, I am not concerned about how I finish the challenge, I am just concerned about ちえさ せれな’s cute ponytail…
